title: Zee news criticising the gormint? This is not something i had expected to see in a life time
selftext: Saw this news piece criticising the cm from the ruling party. Was shocked to see this, honestly. Is it because mr chaudhary is no longer with them or because they are trying to save their bankrupt a**!
comments:
https://thewire.in/media/punya-prasun-bajpai-abp-news-narendra-modi

>“Can you refrain from mentioning the name of Prime Minister Modi [in your programme]? Mention the names of his ministers by all means; point out anything amiss in a government policy if you want to, even name the minister of the concerned ministry. Just don’t refer to Prime Minister Modi anywhere.”

There is only one person that they cannot criticize. Rest are expendable.
They must have not received the monthly "payment" . This is their way of informing that monthly payment is due.
